home.description: <0>Explore the powerful features of <1>react-i18next</1> internationalization library. Click on any feature in the sidebar to see live examples and learn how to implement multilingual support in your React applications.</0>

essentials.title: Translation Essentials
essentials.description: Basic translation methods and key usage patterns

interpolation.title: Variable Interpolation
interpolation.description: Insert dynamic values into your translations

formatting.title: Number & Date Formatting
formatting.description: Format numbers, dates, and currencies based on locale

plurals.title: Pluralization Rules
plurals.description: Handle singular and plural forms automatically

nesting.title: Nested Translations
nesting.description: Allows to reference other keys in a translation

context.title: Contextual Translations
context.description: Provide different translations based on context

fallback.title: Fallback Language
fallback.description: Use a fallback language when translations are missing

demo.title: Interactive Demo
demo.fillFields: Hi {{loggedInUser.name}}, Fill in the fields above to see interpolation in action

demo.title: Context-based Demo
demo.greeting_male_one: Welcome Mr. {{name}}! You have {{count}} new message
demo.greeting_female_one: Welcome Ms. {{name}}! You have {{count}} new message
demo.greeting_male_other: Welcome Mr. {{name}}! You have {{count}} new messages
demo.greeting_female_other: Welcome Ms. {{name}}! You have {{count}} new messages
demo.greeting_male_zero: Welcome Mr. {{name}}! You have no new messages
demo.greeting_female_zero: Welcome Ms. {{name}}! You have no new messages

fallback.title: Fallback
fallback.missingKey: This is a missing translation key in French. Using fallback to default English.
